bibl.title: Comedy.
bibl.note: Article compte rendu de: Ian C. Storey (Edited and Translated by), Fragments of Old Comedy (Cambridge, Mass. - London, 2011) [concerne ausssi: J. Rusten (ed.), The Birth of Comedy: Texts, Documents and Art from Athenian Comic Competitions (Baltimore, 2011)]. - [Introduction.] - 1. Periodization and variety. - 2. The competitive environment. - 3. The comic body. - 4. Where do we go from here? - Avec résumé en anglais.
bibl.seg: Article compte rendu de: Ian C. Storey (Edited and Translated by), Fragments of Old Comedy (Cambridge, Mass. - London, 2011) [concerne ausssi: J. The competitive environment. - 3. The comic body. - 4. Where do we go from here? - Avec résumé en anglais.
